_sText:
Collective is a collaborative or "collective" project that unites the stylistic choices of four mappers.

The mappers involved are as follows

Guadalupe
Jagg
Karasu
Whimsy

Each stage is essentially a "bite-sized" linear map of it's own. There are are four stages (one for each mapper) with no tile triggers and only stage reset triggers. Use this to your advantage. Stand on a bunny-hop pad to enjoy the scenery, or take time to figure out what to do next.

Enabling your radar and "color correction" in settings is advised.

Also, do not hesitate to look for any Easter-eggs or secrets (they are abundant).

Thank you for playing.




Happy birthday Oliver, love you.
